divs: sighting detailsmy father was on a frigate heading back to port in 1951. sometime during a calm and sunny afternoon one area in which they were traveling all of a sudden became very dark and the electrical power on board the ship shorted out and caused total blackness. my dad being hailed to the bridge noticed along with other ship mates six glowing lights in the water on the port side of the ship. he stated the lights were about seven fathoms down and the captain also stated that that it could not possibly be coral which is sometimes seen below the surface. the objects were too cylindrical in shape also. the story get a bit more interesting as he stated that with the total backout the men seemed to have amnesia during this experience. now the strangest of all is the fact that not only do they not remember but by the time they where hailed by canadian military port they were approximately 100 miles off due course of where they were supposed to be at the time. they were also 2 days late as they were supposed to be in on a friday and had arrived of sunday..they did not even realize the two day difference\\now that being said they were told never to speak of it to anyone ever by the captain and some officals ,,,,now my dad is turning 80 soon and still to this day is embedded in his mind and proably those who served with him on this trip returning from the triangle.....
